analysis.key_quote: Efforts to improve performance, accountability and responsiveness to the civil service should start at the highest offices of our government and proposing to remove federal workers at will for bipartisan political agendas is not Democratic or American and instead is a shameful proposition.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service, indicating a preference for maintaining merit-based protections and due process for federal employees.
